name: Negative: The Way of Shinobi
overview: Ninja world and local enemies. Use your best skills to finish the story line. Are you ready to accept the challenge while failing a lot during the gameplay? Become a ninja prodigy, whose clan village was attacked by a mysterious sorcerer alongside the samurai army. Uncover ninja skills, use stealth or head-on approach. Reveal your father's secret intentions and stop the invasion. 1. Hardcore 2D platformer for skilled or stubborn players. 2. Heavy narrative-driven story. 3. Different playstyles available. 4. Stylized graphic design. 5. Hand drawn animations and backgrounds.
